snippet: The lawyer, Daniel A. Hochheiser, expressed frustration with his client, Pedro Espada Jr., who said he felt the same, but the judge refused to release Mr. Hochheiser from his responsibilities.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer, Daniel A. Hochheiser, expressed frustration with his client, Pedro Espada Jr., who said he felt the same, but the judge refused to release Mr. Hochheiser from his responsibilities.

headline.seo: Lawyer for Ex-Senator Espada Tries to Quit Tax Evasion Case
headline.main: Espada’s Lawyer Tries, and Fails, to Quit Tax Evasion Case
headline.print_headline: Espada’s Lawyer Tries, and Fails, to Quit Tax Evasion Case
